Articles.Content:
I remember seeing a *really good* RTG mod--it added different fuels and decay rates for RTG's. Does anyone still have a link, or remember the name? I couldn't find it after a few searches. I think it added Blutonium and Proactinium iirc.

Edit: It was [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115938](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115938)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-29T21:47:21Z" title="05/29/2015 09:47  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 29, 2015</time> by waterlubber**
Thank you! It was the first, [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115938](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115938).
